title: The MHR Manufactured Home Transfer of Sale/Owner Schema

mhrNumber.description: Unique manufactured home registration number assigned by the Manufactured Home Registry when a registration is created.

draftNumber.description: The identifier of the draft document if the registration is created from a draft. Include to mark the draft as used so it will be excluded from the account list.

documentId.description: Unique registration document ID/number assigned by the Manufactured Home Registry.

documentRegistrationNumber.description: The document registration number that uniquely identifies a registration.

documentDescription.description: Included in a response as a description of the registration report document.

registrationType.description:
1. TRAND - transfer due to the death of a joint tenant
  2. TRANS - transfer sale or gift
  3. TRANS_AFFIDAVIT - transfer due to death affidavit of executor
  4. TRANS_ADMIN - transfer due to death letter of administrator
  5. TRANS_WILL - transfer due to death probate of will.

transferDocumentType.description: An optional sub-type that only applies to a transfer due to sale or gift registration. It should only be included when the registration type is TRANS. One of TRANS_LAND_TITLE (LAND TITLE TRANSFER), TRANS_FAMILY_ACT (FAMILY MAINTENANCE ACT), TRANS_INFORMAL_SALE (INFORMAL BILL OF SALE), TRANS_QUIT_CLAIM (QUIT CLAIM TRANSFER), TRANS_SEVER_GRANT (SEVERING/GRANTING JOINT TENANCY), TRANS_RECEIVERSHIP (RECEIVERSHIP TRANSFER), TRANS_TRUST (TRANSFER TO TRUST), or TRANS_LANDLORD (SEIZURE AND SALE BY LANDLORD).

clientReferenceId.description: An optional client reference identifier associated with a change. Provided to facilitate client tracking of MHR activity.

attentionReference.description: The registration document attention or reference information.

createDateTime.description: Generated by the MHR system and included in a response, the date and time a record is created in the system in the ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD.

declaredValue.description: The declared value of the manufactured home as a number. Required for qualified users.

consideration.description: The consideration description or amount in Canadian dollars for the transfer. Required for qualified users.

transferDate.description: The date of the transfer execution in the ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD. The default value is the date of the request submission. Required for qualified users.

ownLand.description: True if the manufactured home is located on land that the new owners own or have a registered lease of not less than 3 years.
